text:
Steve Daskewisz (March 14, 1944 – December 18, 2018) was an American actor and stuntman. He was known for his role as a stunt double supporting the serial killer Jason Voorhees in the movie "Friday the 13th Part 2". He had small roles in "Wolfen" and "The Jazz Singer".
Daskewisz died on December 18, 2018 in West Palm Beach, Florida from complications of diabetes, aged 74.
